Reviews.Title: SX40 HS is superior
Reviews.Author: Robert Goodrich
Reviews.Content: Last years SX40 Hs has superior performance with its somewhat shorter 35x zoom but with better overall optics. AtCanon's website the SX50 is $399 and the SX40 is $429. Give the SX50 another year and Canon will have it rightbut for now I just went with the SX40 and love it. Be sure to get a mono or tripod to take full advantage of theawesome zoom lens. I also went with Canon's lens hood for $25 and Case Logic # 304 case - snug but like it thatway.

ProductInfo.Name: Canon Digital Camera PowerShot SX50HS 12.1MP x50 Optical Zoom PSSX50HS (Japan Imported) (Japan Imported)
